## Question 1
The standard error is the variance of the sampling distribution. 

True or False

## Question 2
A random sample reduces sampling bias. 

True or False

## Question 3
Regardless of the shape of the distribution of the population, the sampling distribution from that population will approach a symmetric distribution with a mean equal to the population mean. 

True or False

<br>
<br>

---  

*Scroll down for answers*  
  
---

<div style="margin-bottom:750px;">

</div>

# Answers
1. False -- the standard error is the standard deviation of the sampling distribution.  
2. True
3. True
